fr.inria.papart.procam

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.papart.procam.Screen

  • public class Screen
extends Object
    This class implements a virtual screen. The position of the screen has to be passed. It no longers handles a camera.
    Author:
    jeremylaviole
